detectors.description:
Certification.setGuardianCertification(address,bool) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Certification.sol#1072-1076) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- guardianCertification[addr] = isCertified (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Certification.sol#1073)
detectors.markdown:

detectors.description:
WithClaimableMigrationOwnership.transferMigrationOwnership(address).newMigrationOwner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Certification.sol#798) lacks a zero-check on :
		- pendingMigrationOwner = newMigrationOwner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Certification.sol#799)

WithClaimableFunctionalOwnership.transferFunctionalOwnership(address).newFunctionalOwner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Certification.sol#1041) lacks a zero-check on :
		- pendingFunctionalOwner = newFunctionalOwner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Certification.sol#1042)
